intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: I'm a passionate developer with over 5 years of experience in bringing success to teams by building great relationships and understanding the needs of clients to build high-performing custom digital solutions. I have a proven history of engineering bespoke web application features and crafting user-friendly designs and components. I'm an avid mentor and open-source contributor, passionate about sharing knowledge and giving back to the development community. My work spans digital interfaces, interactive experiences, and the convergence of design and technology.

Nularian.achievements: Designed and developed a scalable, user-centric interface for Nularian Electrify's AI-automated workflow, resulting in a 25% increase in customer engagement and a 15% reduction in customer support tickets.;Integrated LLM-powered solutions with Nularian Electrify's workflow, resulting in an average of 50% decrease in time-to-value for AI-automated tasks.

Blu Omega Consulting.achievements: Contributed to a federal project team that rebuilt the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute website using Agile methodologies and a DevOps toolset on Microsoft Azure, resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement and a 25% increase in website accessibility compliance.;Cleaned up legacy code resulting in a 25% reduction in total repository size, modernizing the codebase and reducing technical debt.

Business Enterprise Institute.achievements: Developed and maintained custom web applications using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, resulting in a 40% increase in user engagement.;Implemented automated testing and continuous integration pipelines, reducing deployment time by 60% and improving code quality.

State University of New York at Purchase.description: Bachelor of Arts, Media and Communications
